[getMainWorkspace()](./blockly.common_namespace.getmainworkspace_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Returns the last used top level workspace (based on focus). Try not to use this function, particularly if there are multiple Blockly instances on a page.


</td></tr>

<tr><td>

[setParentContainer(newParent)](./blockly.common_namespace.setparentcontainer_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Set the parent container. This is the container element that the WidgetDiv, DropDownDiv, and Tooltip are rendered into the first time `Blockly.inject` is called. This method is a NOP if called after the first `Blockly.inject`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[svgResize(workspace)](./blockly.common_namespace.svgresize_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Size the SVG image to completely fill its container. Call this when the view actually changes sizes (e.g. on a window resize/device orientation change). See workspace.resizeContents to resize the workspace when the contents change (e.g. when a block is added or removed). Record the height/width of the SVG image.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[unregisterWorkpace(workspace)](./blockly.common_namespace.unregisterworkpace_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Unregister a workspace from the workspace db.


</td></tr>
